title: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
description: A guide to spiritual enlightenment and living in the present moment.
review: A transformative book that helps you understand the importance of living in the now, letting go of past and future worries.

title: Feeling Good: The New Mood Therapy
author: David D. Burns
description: A classic self-help book that teaches cognitive behavioral techniques to combat depression.
review: Offers practical techniques to help overcome negative thoughts and feelings, making it a valuable resource for anyone struggling with depression.

title: Mind Over Mood
author: Dennis Greenberger & Christine A. Padesky
description: A practical guide to cognitive therapy that helps manage moods through specific exercises.
review: Provides clear exercises and tools to help individuals understand their emotions and change their moods effectively.

title: The Body Keeps the Score
author: Bessel van der Kolk
description: Explores how trauma affects the body and mind, offering innovative treatments.
review: An eye-opening read on the effects of trauma and various healing methods, essential for understanding the connection between mind and body.
